not-found: No record was found matching search criteria
verify-email-msg-content:
Your account has been verified.
Please login in to Bets Mate.
verify-email-fail-msg-content: Your account has not been verified.
verifiy-email-error:
Your account has failed verification.
Please register again.
expired-email-token-error: The email verification token has expired.
verification-token-error:
An error occurred during verification.
Please try resetting the password again.
reset-text:
Please enter your registered Bets Mate email address.
Once submitted a link to set a new password will be mailed.
reset-token-expired-error:
The reset password token has expired.
Please make a new request.
reset-password-token-error: An error occurred when verifying the password token.
reg-link-msg-content:
An email has been sent to the address provided.
Please click on the link to verify the email address and complete registration.
Please note the link will expire in one hour.
role-error: You do not have permissions to perform that task.
email-error:
An error occurred when sending the email.
Please try again later.
registration-text: Please enter your details and an account activation link will be sent on clicking upon the Register button.
auth-page-decline-warning-msg: You are not authorised to view this page.
reset-link-msg-content:
The reset password link has been sent successfully to your registered email address.
Please click on the link and follow the on screen instructions.
reset-password-text: Please enter a new password and re-enter it for confirmation.
change-pwd-msg-content:
Your password has been saved successfully.
Please use it next time you sign in to Bets Mate
registration-activate-text:
Please enter a password and re-enter it for confirmation.
Complete registration by clicking on the Activation button.
registration-link-text: Please enter an email address and an account activation link will be sent on clicking upon the Send Link button.
register-link-msg-content:
The account activation link has been sent successfully to the email address provided.
Please click on the link and follow the on screen instructions.
user_loggedin-message-error: The page you have navigated to is only for users that have yet to log in.
user_not_loggedin-message-error: The page you have navigated to is only for users that have logged in.
